attributes.action: make the sentence fit the crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that to many criminals are getting light sentences  for crimes that they choose to commit. Do gooders are always banging on about the criminals human rights, what about the human rights of the VICTIMS. The criminals should lose there Human rights when they commit the crime. Life should mean life. The excuse that jails are full does not wash, stick 4 or 5 to a cell  they are there to be punished not for a holiday. If the criminals don't like the conditions they live in the the answewr is simple. " If you can't do the time, don't do the crime

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
